comments.creator: dmalyshau@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Here is the patch - https://phabricator.services.mozilla.com/D75322
I'm getting a steady flow of the same email every couple of minutes:
```
What 	Removed 	Added
Assignee 	nobody@mozilla.org 	dmalyshau@mozilla.com
Status 	NEW 	ASSIGNED

Comment # 1 on Bug 1637998 from Dzmitry Malyshau [:kvark] at 2020-05-14 10:20:06 PDT

Created attachment 9148879

this improves the assertion messages, adds issue templates, and implements From<TextureFormat> for TextureComponentType.
```

The bug itself doesn't appear to be updated, so something must be failing in Phabricator - Bugzilla integration.

comments.raw_text: This was an issue with the phab-bot that updates new revisions and has been cleaned up now. Sorry for the inconvenience.
